Given a lengths of a right triangle evalute the six trig properties

\begin{array}{ll}\n\frac{v}{0} & \sin \theta= \\\n\frac{0}{10} & \cos \theta= \\\nP & 41 \\\n\frac{1}{10} & \tan \theta= \\\n& \csc \theta= \\\n& \sec \theta= \\\n& \cot \theta=\n\end{array}[imath]\frac{v}{0} & \sin \theta= [/imath] [imath]\frac{0}{10} & \cos \theta= [/imath] [imath]P & 41 [/imath] [imath]\frac{1}{10} & \tan \theta= [/imath] [imath]& \csc \theta= [/imath] [imath]& \sec \theta= [/imath] [imath]& \cot \theta=[/imath]
